team2869.bethpage.robotics.aerialassist

Class Ultrasonic

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogChannel
        • team2869.bethpage.robotics.aerialassist.Ultrasonic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LiveWindowSendable, PIDSource, Sendable

    public class Ultrasonic
extends AnalogChannel
    This Ultrasonic class stores the linear regression to transform voltages into distances.
    Author:
    BETHPAGE HIGH SCHOOL, 2014 TEAM #2869 - HARSHIL GARG

      • Ultrasonic

        public Ultrasonic(int channel)
        Constructs an Ultrasonic rangefinder that is wired at the specific channel
        Parameters:
        channel - The analog breakout board channel that the rangefinder is connected to.

      • Ultrasonic

        public Ultrasonic(int moduleNumber,
          int channel)
        Constructs an Ultrasonic rangefinder that is wired at the specific module number and channel.
        Parameters:
        moduleNumber - The module of the analog breakout board.
        channel - The analog breakout board channel that the rangefinder is connected to.

    • Method Detail

      • getVoltage

        public double getVoltage()
        Finds the voltage of the Ultrasonic rangefinder. Voltage scales with increasing distance.
        Overrides:
        getVoltage in class AnalogChannel
        Returns:
        A voltage from 0V to approximately 2.5V.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Calculates the distance in inches or centimeters based on a linear regression developed after testing the ultrasonic rangefinder.
        Returns:
        Distance in inches.
